abstract: The British oil company said that Cameron International, a contractor on the oil well that exploded last year, has agreed to settle claims related to the ensuing spill.
snippet: The British oil company said that Cameron International, a contractor on the oil well that exploded last year, has agreed to settle claims related to the ensuing spill.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The British oil company BP said Friday that Cameron International, one of its contractors in the oil well that burst last year in the Gulf of Mexico, had agreed to pay $250 million to settle claims related to the ensuing spill.

headline.main: Contractor on Oil Spill Has Settled With BP
headline.print_headline: Contractor On Oil Spill Has Settled With BP
